name: Sanitation permits; transfer
text:
Sanitation permits that have not expired as of July 2, 1997, shall be transferable upon the sale of a food establishment; provided that such transfers are subject to the new owner agreeing to abide by the compliance schedule of the department of health. [L 1997, c 334, pt of §1]
Revision Note
  "July 2, 1997," substituted for "the effective date of this Act".
